entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl who didn't return next morning. (CHAPTER THREE)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry spent the day in his bedroom, leaving it only to go to the bathroom. (CHAPTER THREE)

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia shoved food into Harry's room through the cat flap Uncle Vernon had installed three summers ago. (CHAPTER THREE)

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon had installed a cat flap in his house. (CHAPTER THREE)

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, as mentioned in the text 'Hedwig didn't return next morning'. (CHAPTER THREE)
Aunt Petunia is taking care of Harry by shoving food into his room. (CHAPTER THREE)
Uncle Vernon installed a cat flap in his house, which Aunt Petunia used to shove food into Harry's room. (CHAPTER THREE)
